attributes.action: Give UK citizens the right to automatic and binding referenda
attributes.additional_details:
The bullying by the leaders of all three main parties of dissenting MP's over the Europe referendum issue shows how a small group of politicians has hijacked parliament, which increasingly does not represent the citizens of this country.
Set up a Commission to examine the Swiss model of direct democracy, and adopt a UK-devised system, ensuring that the people decide major issues for themselves, not small interest groups.
